description: ### Context Decentralized Finance (DeFi) is gaining momentum day by day and a number of Defi protocols are coming up everyday. [DefiLlama](https://defillama.com/) does a great job of capturing all the data related to Defi and open sourcing the same for us to analyze and use. ### Content Details about different defi protocols, the chains they belong to, total value locked etc are present in this dataset at daily basis. ### Acknowledgements [DefiLlama](https://defillama.com/) is the one who made this dataset and I am just publishing it here for ease of analysis. Photo Credits: Photo by Shubham Dhage on Unsplash ### Inspiration Some questions are 1. Which DeFi protocols are gaining momentum? 2. Which chains are gaining prominence in the DeFi space? 3. Change in TVL value over time at protocol / chain level?
title: DeFi Dataset from DefiLlama
